Echoes of the Opera or Hiawatha
Lincoln, Lincolnshire, England, UK March contest(own choice) - 1st Amington, 2nd Huthwaite, 3rd Ruston's. Prizes - 1st £14, 2nd £8, 3rd £6, 4th £2. 4 bands competed.
Nov. 6, 2013, 11:45 a.m. Feb. 26, 2021, 11:04 p.m.
